__e: Some people can't even commit to a weekend, you know that?

How can you commit for the rest of your life when you don't even know what kind of life you want?
I-I didn't know what I wanted, and I definitely wasn't ready for a lifetime commitment.
I have work, and then I have a dinner thing, and then I am busy trying to become who I am.
This isn't a commitment, it's a case!
I do believe in that part of the pledge that I just read, but a pledge, come on, who are we ?
I'm not sure I'm ready for the kind of commitment that you're looking for.
Don't eyebrow me. It's a work thing.
Are you sure you don't have any business to attend to while you're here?
She had a really important work thing in New York, that she had to fly back for last night.
There are many things of this sort... including love and death and my business for today.
